definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Millions of money to anger, revenge Japanese mountain.
sentences.chinese: 錢百萬怒不可遏，決意下山報復日軍。

sentences.english: Experience of Zhao shake day arrived the might of landmine, be determined learns to make thunder technology secretly.
sentences.chinese: 趙震天見識到了地雷的威力，決意偷學造雷技術。

sentences.english: He resigned in 1927 and decided to become a writer.
sentences.chinese: 1927年，奧威爾辭去職務，決意成爲一名作家。

sentences.english: But she fell in love with this life is determined that a cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 但她這輩子是決意愛上了那一杯奶茶。

sentences.english: However, there is no assurance that the price will move in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 然而，沒有保證價格決意搬進一條直線。

sentences.english: She is absolutely set on publishing as a career.
I have decided to learn shorthand.
For which cause, forbearing no longer, we thought it good to remain at Athens alone.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，我們不能再等待，就決意獨自留在雅典。

sentences.english: What agony was this! And the man seemed resolved to protract it.
sentences.chinese: 那是什麼病痛呀？這人似乎決意吞吞吐吐。

sentences.english: Having opted to leave, Bergkamp's decision to join Arsenal was made quickly.
sentences.chinese: 決意要走，於是他很快決定加盟阿森納。

sentences.english: And the man seemed resolved to protract it.
sentences.chinese: 這人似乎決意吞吞吐吐。

sentences.english: Many people make and break the same resolution year after year.
sentences.chinese: 許多人年復一年制定和打破相同的決意。

sentences.english: The bus was late, and the driver was bent on reaching the school on time.
sentences.chinese: 汽車開遲了，駕駛員決意準時開到學校。

sentences.english: The second day will go to Paris pear son clothing, determined to find the U.
sentences.chinese: 第二天將要去巴黎的梨衣子，決意去找美加。

sentences.english: And Judas purposed to destroy them: and he called together all the people, to besiege them.
sentences.chinese: 猶大決意剷除他們，便召集全體百姓，向他們圍攻。

sentences.english: But if you decide to ③make the leap, tread carefully.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你決意“來一段”的話，一定得步步小心。

definition: determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
